mapper.sql: file.file_id as "file.id", file.file_original_name as "file.originalName", file.file_new_name as "file.newName", file.file_base_path as "file.basePath", file.file_relative_path as "file.relativePath", file.file_relative_url as "file.relativeUrl", file.file_mime_type as "file.mimeType", file.file_create_time as "file.createTime", file.file_update_time as "file.updateTime"

headImg.file_id as "headImg.id", headImg.file_original_name as "headImg.originalName", headImg.file_new_name as "headImg.newName", headImg.file_base_path as "headImg.basePath", headImg.file_relative_path as "headImg.relativePath", headImg.file_relative_url as "headImg.relativeUrl", headImg.file_mime_type as "headImg.mimeType", headImg.file_create_time as "headImg.createTime", headImg.file_update_time as "headImg.updateTime"

images.file_id as "images.id", images.file_original_name as "images.originalName", images.file_new_name as "images.newName", images.file_base_path as "images.basePath", images.file_relative_path as "images.relativePath", images.file_relative_url as "images.relativeUrl", images.file_mime_type as "images.mimeType", images.file_create_time as "images.createTime", images.file_update_time as "images.updateTime"

image.file_id as "image.id", image.file_original_name as "image.originalName", image.file_new_name as "image.newName", image.file_base_path as "image.basePath", image.file_relative_path as "image.relativePath", image.file_relative_url as "image.relativeUrl", image.file_mime_type as "image.mimeType", image.file_create_time as "image.createTime", image.file_update_time as "image.updateTime"
